txt.en: Sundered in battles long ago between Angmar and the Zhélruka, Tûr Fúar, the Drearspire looms over Câr Bronach like a twisted, skeletal talon. Within the tower's walls, vile plants grow in experiments, perfecting blights and poisons for the Iron Crown. These plants must be destroyed.
Destroy vile plants at Tûr Fúar
Destroyed vile plants at Tûr Fúar ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Sundered in battles long ago between Angmar and the Zhélruka, Tûr Fúar, the Drearspire looms over Câr Bronach like a twisted, skeletal talon.
Tûr Fúar, the Drearspire, can be found in central Câr Bronach.\n\nYou should destroy vile plants at Tûr Fúar.
